3.9.1.2. systemmetadata.SystemMetadata¶

class systemmetadata.SystemMetadata(xmldoc)¶

Wrapper around a system metadata entry. Provides convenience properties for accessing the parsed content of the document.

__init__(xmldoc)¶
Parameters:
  • xmldoc – (Unicode) The XML document to parse as system metadata.

Methods

__init__(xmldoc)
Parameters:
  • xmldoc – (Unicode) The XML document to parse as system metadata.
isValid()¶

Validate the document. :rtype: None if all good, otherwise an exception is raised.

toXml(encoding='utf-8', pretty=True)¶

Spits out representation of the parsed xml.

Parameters:
  • pretty – Output is a bit easier for human digestion if True
Return type:

(string) UTF-8 encoded string

Attributes

accessRule
rtype:(list of 3-tuple) [(type, service, principal), ... ]
checksum
checksumAlgorithm
dateSysMetadataModified
rtype:(DateTime or None)
dateUploaded
rtype:(DateTime)

rtype:(list of unicode)

rtype:(lsit of unicode)
describes
rtype:(list of unicode)

rtype:(DateTime or None)

rtype:(list of unicode)
obsoletes
rtype:(list of unicode)
pid
replica
rtype:(list of dictionaries) Each entry contains replica details
size
rtype:(integer) The reported size of the object from the sysmeta
